body:
The server is dead in the water, and most of you don't know me anyways. So basically, this post will be buried in a day.

Overall, ask me anything at all: I will answer completely honestly.

title: F*** it   AMA

replies.body:
Opinions?

Do you think the US will break apart one day?

Are we in World War 3?

Do you see hope in our future?

Will Trump be president in 2020?
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?

Do you think the US will break apart one day?

Are we in World War 3?

Do you see hope in our future?

Will Trump be president in 2020?

replies.body:
Opinions? Isn't exactly a question.

Nope, I think in the end-game, the whole world will come together and be governed under one body (me).

Nah, everyone is too big of p***ies to start stuff.

Who's future? The question is too vague.

Probably not. But, the economy is doing well and people are making more than ever, so maybe.
